ygData.subject: Re: BardSpeed (tm)
ygData.msgSnippet: I accidently deleted the message I wanted to reply to, but since Robin gave us this nice topic titled BardSpeed, I ll just reply here.  :) You can outrun
ygData.messageBody:
I accidently deleted the message I wanted to reply to, but
since Robin gave us this nice topic titled BardSpeed, I'll
just reply here. :)

You can outrun normal mobs (including giants) while almost
dead at about level 20 with a normal drum. You can actually
outrun them quite a bit earlier, but the speed difference is
not enough to let you avoid getting hit multiple times. Level
20 is the first time I distinctly remember Accel with a drum
letting me give a party member (with literally nothing showing
on his hp bar) a clean getaway from the mobs chasing him.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
